M

main(String[]) - Static method in class Nim.NimTester
 
move(int) - Method in class Nim.DumbComputer
Dumb Computer makes a move by removing a random number of marbles between 1 and half the amount of marbles in the pile
move(int) - Method in class Nim.HumanPlayer
Asks the player how many marbles he/she wishes to remove out of the pile; if it is a valid amount, that amount is returned
move(int) - Method in interface Nim.Player
 
move(int) - Method in class Nim.SmartComputer
Smart Computer makes a move by removing an amount from anywhere between 1 to half the amount of marbles present in the pile such that the amount of marbles in the pile after it's turn is a power of 2
